◆ replace()

std::string clutchlog::replace ( const std::string &  form,
const std::string &  mark,
const std::string &  tag 
) const
inline

Replace mark by tag in form.

log.replace("{greet} {world}", "\\{greet\\}", "hello");
// returns "hello {world}"
